description:
On his last visit, Boyd told me that his girlfriend (fiancee) has really been enjoying watching him fuck on the website. Apparently they watch his movies together and then he screws her. He said she's even been asking him about bringing another guy into their bedroom. I can't wait to hear about how that goes!
Sebastien is the lucky recipient of Boyd's cock in this installment. Sebastien has such a cute little bubble butt and Boyd really works it over...
You might notice that Boyd is wearing a bandage on his foot. He injured himself during a martial arts session.
title: Sebastien & Boyd
